name: Spiders
wikiSummary: "Spiders" is a song by American heavy metal band System of a Down from their first album, also named System of a Down. The song was featured on the Scream 3 soundtrack.
wikiText: "Spiders" is a song by American heavy metal band System of a Down from their first album, also named System of a Down. The song was featured on the Scream 3 soundtrack.
